title: The Marvelous Mustache: A dark and spooky magical bedtime story
description: What price are you willing to pay for a wish? “A whiff of your youth, an ounce of your innocence, a pinch of your troubles, and a drop of your blood,” the stranger said, tapping his sharp nails on the wooden table.When Freddie arrives in the quaint town of Neitherherenorthere with only a few of his belongings and his shadows, he thinks it will just be another stop. Little did he know that fate would lead him to the Midnight Stew Shop and a mysterious stranger who'd grant him a wish.Freddie longs to prove to his father that he can achieve great things. But there's one thing holding him back - a mustache. As all mustaches go, they come when they're ready, and Freddie's is taking its sweet time… until an anonymous gift arrives.As Freddie's mustache unravels so does his world. Will it bring him the success he craves, or will the price he must pay be too steep?
author: Violet Emberstone
